Interface IAirQualityApi

Interface for accessing air quality data from external APIs. Provides methods to retrieve location data, latest air quality measurements, and historical air quality data for specific sensors.

Namespace: EnviroMonitorApp.Services.Apis
Assembly: EnviroMonitorApp.Core.dll
Syntax
public interface IAirQualityApi

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

GetLocationLatest(int)

Gets the latest air quality measurements for a specific location.

Declaration
[Get("/v3/locations/{locationId}/latest")]
Task<LocationLatestResponse> GetLocationLatest(int locationId)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int locationId

The unique identifier of the location
Returns
Type Description
Task<LocationLatestResponse>

A response containing the latest measurements for the specified location
| Edit this page View Source

GetLocations(string, string, int, string, int)

Retrieves a list of air quality monitoring locations based on geographic criteria.

Declaration
[Get("/v3/locations")]
Task<LocationResponse> GetLocations(string iso, string latlon, int radiusMeters, string parameterIdsCsv, int limit)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string iso

The ISO country code (e.g., "GB" for Great Britain)
string latlon

Comma-separated latitude and longitude coordinates (e.g., "51.5074,-0.1278")
int radiusMeters

Search radius in meters from the specified coordinates
string parameterIdsCsv

Comma-separated list of parameter IDs to filter by (e.g., "2,1,7,9" for specific pollutants)
int limit

Maximum number of locations to return
Returns
Type Description
Task<LocationResponse>

A response containing matching air quality monitoring locations
| Edit this page View Source

GetSensorMeasurementsAsync(int, string, string, int, int)

Retrieves historical air quality measurements for a specific sensor within a date range.

Declaration
[Get("/v3/sensors/{sensorId}/measurements")]
Task<MeasurementsResponse> GetSensorMeasurementsAsync(int sensorId, string datetimeFromUtc, string datetimeToUtc, int limit, int page)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int sensorId

The unique identifier of the sensor
string datetimeFromUtc

Start date and time in UTC format
string datetimeToUtc

End date and time in UTC format
int limit

Maximum number of measurements to return per page
int page

Page number for paginated results
Returns
Type Description
Task<MeasurementsResponse>

A response containing historical measurements for the specified sensor
